function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of responsible economic operators and nations.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Encourage responsible economic practices and international collaboration on public health measures.","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring and contact tracing apps.","People":"General population, public health authorities, government agencies.","Owner":"Government, international organizations, private sector."},{"Description":"Vulnerability of computer systems and databases to cyber attacks and security breaches.","Impact":"Data theft, financial loss, and disruption of critical services.","Mitigation":"Invest in cybersecurity measures, data encryption, and regular security audits.","Technologies":"Firewalls, encryption software, and threat intelligence platforms.","People":"Government agencies, banks, companies.","Owner":"IT departments, cybersecurity firms, government agencies."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on virtual banking and financial services.","Impact":"Cyber fraud, financial scams, and security vulnerabilities in virtual payment platforms.","Mitigation":"Implement strong authentication methods, encryption, and fraud detection technologies.","Technologies":"Biometric authentication, tokenization, and secure communication protocols.","People":"Bank customers, financial institutions, government regulatory agencies.","Owner":"Financial institutions, technology providers, regulatory authorities."}]}
